paper_abstract: In the last two decades, researchers have really been embracing the idea of G-networks with negative arrivals and the relevant product form solution including nonlinear traffic equations, which is the unified model for queueing networks and neural networks. This paper reports the initiative to collect and classify a bibliography on G-networks. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An initiative for a classified bibliography on G-networks
